workflow.name: Course recommendation system for surveys with data tables and GPT-4.1-Mini
workflow.description:
Use the **n8n Data Tables** feature to store, retrieve, and analyze survey results ‚Äî then let OpenAI automatically recommend the most relevant course for each respondent.

---

## üß† What this workflow does
This workflow demonstrates how to use **n8n‚Äôs built-in Data Tables** to create an internal recommendation system powered by AI.

It:
- Collects **survey responses** through a Form Trigger  
- Saves responses to a **Data Table** called `Survey Responses`  
- Fetches a list of available courses from another **Data Table** called `Courses`  
- Passes both Data Tables into an **OpenAI Chat Agent**, which selects the most relevant course  
- Returns a structured recommendation with:
  - `course`: the course title  
  - `reasoning`: why it was selected  

> **Trigger:** Form submission (manual or public link)

---

## üë• Who it‚Äôs for
Perfect for educators, training managers, or anyone wanting to use **n8n Data Tables** as a lightweight internal database ‚Äî ideal for AI-driven recommendations, onboarding workflows, or content personalization.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è How to set it up
### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Create your **n8n Data Tables**
This workflow uses **two Data Tables** ‚Äî both created directly inside n8n.

#### üßæ Table 1: `Survey Responses`
Columns:
- `Name`
- `Q1` ‚Äî Where did you learn about n8n?
- `Q2` ‚Äî What is your experience with n8n?
- `Q3` ‚Äî What kind of automations do you need help with?

To create:
1. Add a **Data Table node** to your workflow.  
2. From the list, click **‚ÄúCreate New Data Table.‚Äù**  
3. Name it **Survey Responses** and add the columns above.

---

#### üìö Table 2: `Courses`
Columns:
- `Course`
- `Description`

To create:
1. Add another **Data Table node**.  
2. Click **‚ÄúCreate New Data Table.‚Äù**  
3. Name it **Courses** and create the columns above.  
4. Copy course data from this Google Sheet:  
   üëâ https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Y0Q0CnqN0w47c5nCpbA1O3sn0mQaKXPhql2Bc1UeiFY/edit?usp=sharing

This **Courses Data Table** is where you‚Äôll store all available learning paths or programs for the AI to compare against survey inputs.

---

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect OpenAI
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Create an API key  
3. In n8n, open **Credentials ‚Üí OpenAI API** and paste your key  
4. The workflow uses the **gpt-4.1-mini** model via the LangChain integration

---

## üß© Key Nodes Used
| Node | Purpose | n8n Feature |
|------|----------|-------------|
| **Form Trigger** | Collect survey responses | Forms |
| **Data Table (Upsert)** | Stores results in `Survey Responses` | **Data Tables** |
| **Data Table (Get)** | Retrieves `Courses` | **Data Tables** |
| **Aggregate + Set** | Combines and formats table data | Core nodes |
| **OpenAI Chat Model (LangChain Agent)** | Analyzes responses and courses | AI |
| **Structured Output Parser** | Returns structured JSON output | LangChain |

---

## üí° Tips for customization
- Add more **Data Table columns** (e.g., email, department, experience years)  
- Use another **Data Table** to store AI recommendations or performance results  
- Modify the **Agent system message** to customize how AI chooses courses  
- Send recommendations via **Email**, **Slack**, or **Google Sheets**

---

## üßæ Why Data Tables?
This workflow shows how **n8n‚Äôs Data Tables** can act as your internal database:
- Create and manage tables directly inside n8n  
- No external integrations needed  
- Store structured data for AI prompts  
- Share tables across multiple workflows  

All user data and course content are stored securely and natively in **n8n Cloud or Self-Hosted** environments.

---

## üì¨ Contact  
Need help customizing this (e.g., expanding Data Tables, connecting multiple surveys, or automating follow-ups)?  

- üìß **robert@ynteractive.com**  
- üîó **[Robert Breen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-breen-29429625/)**  
- üåê **[ynteractive.com](https://ynteractive.com)**

parameters.content:
### Recommend the Best n8n Course from a User Survey (Form Trigger + **Data Tables** + OpenAI Agent)

Use the **n8n Data Tables** feature to store, retrieve, and analyze survey results ‚Äî then let OpenAI automatically recommend the most relevant course for each respondent.

### Recommend the Best n8n Course from a User Survey (Form Trigger + **Data Tables** + OpenAI Agent)

@[youtube](lFbjJAcWII8)


## ‚öôÔ∏è How to set it up
### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Create your **n8n Data Tables**
This workflow uses **two Data Tables** ‚Äî both created directly inside n8n.

#### üßæ Table 1: `Survey Responses`
Columns:
- `Name`
- `Q1` ‚Äî Where did you learn about n8n?
- `Q2` ‚Äî What is your experience with n8n?
- `Q3` ‚Äî What kind of automations do you need help with?

To create:
1. Add a **Data Table node** to your workflow.  
2. From the list, click **‚ÄúCreate New Data Table.‚Äù**  
3. Name it **Survey Responses** and add the columns above.

---

#### üìö Table 2: `Courses`
Columns:
- `Course`
- `Description`

To create:
1. Add another **Data Table node**.  
2. Click **‚ÄúCreate New Data Table.‚Äù**  
3. Name it **Courses** and create the columns above.  
4. Copy course data from this Google Sheet:  
   üëâ https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Y0Q0CnqN0w47c5nCpbA1O3sn0mQaKXPhql2Bc1UeiFY/edit?usp=sharing

This **Courses Data Table** is where you‚Äôll store all available learning paths or programs for the AI to compare against survey inputs.

---

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect OpenAI
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Create an API key  
3. In n8n, open **Credentials ‚Üí OpenAI API** and paste your key  
4. The workflow uses the **gpt-4.1-mini** model via the LangChain integration

## üì¨ Contact  
Need help customizing this (e.g., expanding Data Tables, connecting multiple surveys, or automating follow-ups)?  

- üìß **robert@ynteractive.com**  
- üîó **[Robert Breen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-breen-29429625/)**  
- üåê **[ynteractive.com](https://ynteractive.com)**

#### üìö Table 2: `Courses`
Columns:
- `Course`
- `Description`

To create:
1. Add another **Data Table node**.  
2. Click **‚ÄúCreate New Data Table.‚Äù**  
3. Name it **Courses** and create the columns above.  
4. Copy course data from this Google Sheet:  
   üëâ https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Y0Q0CnqN0w47c5nCpbA1O3sn0mQaKXPhql2Bc1UeiFY/edit?usp=sharing

This **Courses Data Table** is where you‚Äôll store all available learning paths or programs for the AI to compare against survey inputs.

#### üßæ Table 1: `Survey Responses`
Columns:
- `Name`
- `Q1` ‚Äî Where did you learn about n8n?
- `Q2` ‚Äî What is your experience with n8n?
- `Q3` ‚Äî What kind of automations do you need help with?

To create:
1. Add a **Data Table node** to your workflow.  
2. From the list, click **‚ÄúCreate New Data Table.‚Äù**  
3. Name it **Survey Responses** and add the columns above.

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up OpenAI Connection
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Navigate to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview)  
3. Add funds to your billing account  
4. Copy your API key into the **OpenAI credentials** in n8n

user.name: Robert Breen
user.bio: Professional services consultant with over 10 years of experience solving complex business problems across industries. I specialize in n8n and process automation‚Äîdesigning custom workflows that integrate tools like Google Calendar, Airtable, GPT, and internal systems. Whether you need to automate scheduling, sync data, or streamline operations, I build solutions that save time and drive results.
